Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States House of Representatives and the United States Senate to pass and for the President to sign H.R. 873 and S.453 entitled “The Motorcoach Enhanced Safety Act of 2011, which would seek to overhaul and increase the safety of intercity buses.
Items.MatterName: The Motorcoach Enhanced Safety Act of 2011.  (H.R.873/S.453)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States House of Representatives and the United States Senate to pass and the President to sign H.R. 1390 entitled “The Bus Uniform Standards and Enhanced Safety Act of 2011,” which would seek to strengthen the regulation, monitoring and oversight of the motor carrier industry.
Items.MatterName: The Bus Uniform Standards and Enhanced Safety Act of 2011 (H.R. 1390)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass and the Governor to sign A.8113, in relation to the qualifications of bus drivers.
Oversight: Protecting Passengers - Ensuring the Safety of Intercity Buses.
Items.MatterName: Oversight: Protecting Passengers - Ensuring the Safety of Intercity Buses.
